result.execSummary:
The defendant Danny E Clouse was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant in custody and present via video from the Green Lake County Jail and without counsel.

1:05 p.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court via video from the Green Lake County Jail and without counsel.  Statement by defendant - missed a couple of payments.  Court questions defendant regarding missed court dates.  Statement by defendant - released from jail in June and found out he was homeless and has been off work for the last month.  Statement by defendant - called the COC office to tell them that he was not able to make his payments and did not know when he could.  Court questions defendant regarding address and employment.  Statement by defendant - address is:  1207 Dunn Street   Portage, WI  53901.  Court instructs the defendant is to keep COC office informed of his address and is continue to pay $25 per month at the end of each month commencing 10/31 and each month thereafter, and if he could afford to pay more, he should.  Court orders a warrant and stays that pending compliance with the payment plan.  Court quashes the warrants.

Court adjourned at 1:09 p.m.

Settlement Form (PTC)

2:18 p.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Jon Wilsnack.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement on 2015CM239 - defendant will plea to the charge with a fine and costs.  State concurs.  Atty Wilsnack concurs.  Defendant concurs.  Court recites agreement on 2015CT75 - defendant will plea to OWI - 4th and the balance of the counts will be dismissed.  State concurs.  Statement by Atty Wilsnack - defendant will serve sentence here until space available and requests out of county transfer.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaires with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on 15CM239 (BJ) and 15CT75 Count 1 (OWI-4th), strikes the enhancer and refusal.  Court orders the balance of the counts be dismissed.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Wilsnack.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

2015CM239 (BJ)

-$100 fine plus court costs - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.
-Defendant is to re-pay the costs for Court appointed attorney fees.

2015CT75 (OWI-4th)

-Fine and costs totalling $3,468.00 - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Blood Draw Fee - $42.50
-AODA
-210 days county jail, with huber and to commence immediately.  Court grants out of county service.
-DL revocation - 36 months
-IID - 36 months
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.
-Defendant is to re-pay the costs for Court appointed attorney fees.

Atty Wilsnack to submit bill for attorney fees.

Court remands the defendant to the custody the Green Lake County Sheriff's Dept.

Court adjourned at 2:31 p.m.
State's
Plea/sentencing hearing at 01-05-2016 02:00 pm

Court sets for Plea & Sentencing on January 5, 2016 at 2:00 P.M.

records.addlTxt: Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Status hearing at 12-08-2015 11:00 am
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

8:50 A.M.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status Hearing on December 8, 2015 at 11:00 a.m.

Court adjourned at 8:53 a.m.
